meanings.definition: To make a request or plea to a higher power
meanings.sent1: She prayed for good health for her family.
meanings.sent2: Every night, she prayed for guidance and strength.
meanings.sent3: The little girl prayed for her lost teddy bear to magically appear.
meanings.sent4: As the storm approached, the sailors prayed for safe passage.
meanings.sent5: The farmer prayed for rain to nourish his crops.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she prayed for a successful outcome.
meanings.sent2: After the ceremony, they all prayed together.
meanings.sent3: He prayed for a sunny day, but woke up to pouring rain.
meanings.sent4: The team prayed for victory before the championship game.
meanings.sent5: She prayed for forgiveness for her mistakes.

meanings.definition: To utter a prayer to a deity or higher power
meanings.sent1: The monk prayed silently in the temple.
meanings.sent2: In times of trouble, she always prayed to her guardian angel.
meanings.sent3: The cat prayed for a bountiful bowl of tuna.
meanings.sent4: The old tree prayed for one more spring to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The child prayed to the stars for a wish to come true.
